tool_description: Generates comprehensive API documentation with endpoint descriptions, request/response schemas, and interactive examples.

endpoints.description: List of API endpoints to document

error_messages: Empty API title: Provide a meaningful API title
Invalid version format: Use semantic versioning (e.g., 1.0.0)
Invalid base URL: Provide a valid HTTP/HTTPS URL
No endpoints provided: Include at least one endpoint to document
Invalid output format: Use one of [swagger, openapi, markdown]
usage: Provide api_title, api_version, base_url, and endpoints array. Select desired output_format for the documentation.
